channel.title: esp32s3 on un01s notes

item.title: Reading Code of Toit [FE25]
item.description: When I started to port the code to ESP32S3 following the example of ESP32C3, I realized I had to read the code closely. Here are the notes along the way. where does the code get started on esp32? Based on esp-idf, Toit creates a new environment with a lot of free goodies such as over-the-air update through WiFi, easy tasks, and a high-level programming language with a built-in virtual machine for developers.
